column1: Smoque BBQ////This place serves food so delicious it could make me lapse into cheezy double entendres: holy smoque! for example.  I love this food
column2: but I've never actually gone inside
column4: having only picked up to-go orders. But I sat in the car while my friend ran in
column5: and even THAT was great!  Anyway
column8: and pulled pork sammy with uber delicious slaw. You will love it
column9: I guarantee. It makes me embrace my inner redneck
column10: after all these years. Need more joints like this in my neighborhood. Be prepared to consume massive amounts
